title: MFM Minisode 9
description: On this week’s My Favorite Murder minisode, Karen and Georgia read your hometown murder stories including serial killer Henry Lee Lucas, murderer Mark Winger, and a two-parter involving a feigned love of camping, a dead body, and a couch covered in blood!
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
